@schlafshane #thanksbrexit

I think today might be a good one to take a social media break. Could someone give me a call if nukes are launched? Thanks.

@marycarty @OutboxIncubator Definitely - I'm excited for the future, attitudes are really changing thanks to work like yours :)
"The people closest to the problem are those most equipped to solve it" - PWD must be included in design process @elizejackson #Inspirefest
.@elizejackson sees designers accomodation exceptional needs of athletes, but ignoring needs of people w disabilities. #Inspirefest
"Contrary to popular belief, people with disabilities do not exist be be inspirational." YES. @elizejackson #Inspirefest
"Maybe we're less fun because we don't like strippers.Or we do, but not at work." @Vosmek on overwhelming lack of women in VC #Inspirefest ðŸ˜‚
.@karaswisher absolutely slaying the notion of unconscious bias - "it's an excuse for laziness, or maybe stupidity" #Inspirefest
"If talk doesn't get you there, you need quotas." @ClaudiaIannazzo on pushing VC firms to accept diversity #Inspirefest
"The problem is the process - not women." @vckis dismissing the notion that women need to be fixed, aren't confident enough etc #Inspirefest
Very much looking forward to seeing @zophilpott's @AdaTheShow tonight after seeing her talk yesterday #Inspirefest https://t.co/7jSvSUWrrO
@maketimecountuk @OutboxIncubator @marycarty Exactly! Learned HTML from a dogeared manual at 11, lost interest as no support in Cavan in 90s
Worth noting the humble donkey was still in use in 70s in West of Ireland-no smartphones tho ðŸ˜… @kouljay #Inspirefest https://t.co/N8vIlUtRY3
@dalekmad @LooRate @EchoingSTEM Esp when most barstaff are dudes - can't/won't check ladies bathroom once business opens!
Smallholders in Kenya recieving 1/3 or less of market price of their goods - @mfarm_ke hoping to change this @kouljay #Inspirefest
"The biggest change is that I'm happy. I wasn't always,but I am now." Karla O'Brien on her exp as trans woman #Inspirefest #somethinginmyeye
"I hit my peak as Johnson&Johnsons Baby of the Year in 1984" - Karla O'Brien's charming & self-depracating account of her life #Inspirefest
Love Vanessa Greene's toilet-rating app idea - time to get all those awful pub toilets sorted ðŸ˜‚ @EchoingSTEM #Inspirefest
Cheers to @frizzyroselle for thinking of those of us a little older starting in STEM - not so much support for us out there ðŸ‘µðŸ¼ #Inspirefest
Same goes for @CoderDojo & their support of young ppl getting into tech for the first time - huge respect for @niamhscanlonirl! #Inspirefest
Something like @OutboxIncubator would have absolutely changed my life as a young tech-obsessed girl - bravo @marycarty! #Inspirefest
Can empathise with feeling the need to be at top of the game to be respected in technical sphere as a woman @OutboxIncubator #Inspirefest
"We need @OutboxIncubator because our girls don't feel like they belong." Hear, hear! @marycarty #Inspirefest
"In this society, we cap the ambitions of our girls. We do it unconsciously." @marycarty @OutboxIncubator #Inspirefest
.@marycarty speaking movingly about reasons for founding @OutboxIncubator - feeling like she didn't belong, as a woman in STEM #Inspirefest
Award for most adorable pres. at #Inspirefest goes to @_elena for her short film about space-obsessed Abigail â¤ï¸ https://t.co/betGNE1YxL
True! Speaking of dream jobs... #callmeJJ https://t.co/tn9mA9xALE
Star Wars seems to be the unofficial theme of #Inspirefest: Yoda quotes, lightsaber sound effects, film stills...
.@hazel_moore's 90yr old aunt writing Â£10 cheques for the kids' bdays, which then expire - seems to be working for the aunt ðŸ˜‰ #Inspirefest
Holland now talking about @sorotoolkit - an accessible way to get started with soft robotics #Inspirefest
Donal Holland on using pneumatics in soft robotic devices that can't hurt our squishy human bodies if they malfunction #Inspirefest
"I'm giving clinicians a Parking Sensor for their needle" - Lisa Helen. Amazing potential to impact everyday healthcare. #Inspirefest
"If we make peripheral neeve block easier to perform... more ppl can perform it" - can avoid general anaesthesia in many cases #Inspirefest
Powerful implications for "nerve block" anaesthetic procedure - real time feedback from needle tip on what tissue it's touching #Inspirefest
Lisa Helen from @TyndallInstitut describing her PhD project: developing smart needles for *exquisitely* targeted drug delivery #inspirefest
Analogy of the Day: Adrian Bennis comparing challenge for immune system to find&kill cancer cells to Arnie taking down Predator #Inspirefest
.@crblease making case for introducing philosophical thinking into medicine; should be taught to all in school from age 5 #Inspirefest
"Algorithms are beginning to outperform humans in making diagnoses"- amazing implications for impacting medical error @crblease #Inspirefest
Doctors practicing "defensive medicine" as result of overly litigious culture - "medicine sets doctors up to fail" @crblease #Inspirefest
"By the time your doctor graduated, half of what she learned was out of date" & docs can't keep up w new knowledge @crblease #Inspirefest
Nice to hear Irish artists playing over the speakers at #Inspirefest during the intervals - @wearevillagers earlier, @cathy_davey just now
Ross now on long-established use of wearables in industry vs challenge of consumer wearables: you have to justify the need #Inspirefest
Ross on advanced tech like Google Glass - "It's the hammer looking for the nail." #Inspirefest
Ross making excellent point on designers being restricted by type of media they work with - design skills are transferable #Inspirefest
"You have so much data, but if you don't make it useful for the user... it's just noise" - @lara_hanlon #Inspirefest
Key challenge for designers is to "get to grips with data... How do I build data collection into what I'm doing?" - @fjordmark #inspirefest
"Design education is not keeping up with the industry" - most programs still teaching students to make chairs (!) - Ross #inspirefest
.@alansiegel on panel warning against designers getting carried away with tech - "who are you trying to communicate with?" #Inspirefest
Innovation in design should be all about "amplifying the voice of the end user" - wise words from Lorna Ross #Inspirefest
Patient's wife to surgeon: "what questions should I ask that I don't know to ask?" Def using this in next yr's physics lectures #Inspirefest
"Something about this environment [was] telling me they don't like change..!" Ross on Mayo Clinic #Inspirefest https://t.co/LUMZZNaCGe
"Innovation is not always about things getting better" - Lorna Ross on design innovation as response to sudden adverse change #Inspirefest
"Ppl only project what they know - they don't know what you know." @alansiegel #Inspirefest
Crucial importance of clarity in branding: "establishing a clear & differentiating purpose" @AlanSiegel #Inspirefest https://t.co/DIwgsAhj7a
Some bright & airy snaps from @urchinpearse's Nocturnes gathering yesterday: https://t.co/2FwKLDghsB @BlueStackRcrds https://t.co/zb2uMaF9Yg
"All of us can be allies to people who are different to us" - @judithmwilliams #inspirefest
"People see a place for themselves where perhaps they didn't 10-15yrs ago" - @ellenjshook1 on importance of setting example #Inspirefest
Margot Slattery on her own past experience at work as lgbt person: "you [brought] half of yourself to work"; real change since. #Inspirefest
Key to a more diverse workplace? Don't hire for 'culture fit', hire for 'culture contribution'. @judithmwilliams #Inspirefest
Notion of 'widening the funnel' - broadening definition of what merits attention - more women become visible. @judithmwilliams #inspirefest
